title: Saïd Maanan
text: Welcome to Saïd Maanan’s corner! I am a passionate reseacher and educator and currently serve as a Lecturer in Biostatistics and Epidemiology at the Higher Institute of Nursing Professions and Health Techniques in Guelmim, Morocco.

title: Saïd Maanan
text:
Education
I successfully earned my Ph.D. in Statistics from the University of Auckland on June 10, 2019. My doctoral research concentrated on innovating effective algorithms for estimating directed and undirected graphs in multivariate time series. Additionally, I introduced a novel information-theoretic criterion specifically tailored for optimal performance with time series data. Before pursuing my Ph.D., I achieved distinction in both a Master’s degree in Statistics and a Bachelor’s degree in Economics.

title: Saïd Maanan
text:
Experience
After completing my Ph.D., I held various research and teaching positions. As a postdoctoral researcher at Aalto University’s Department of Computer Science, I developed a profound understanding of the intersections between statistics and computer science. Additionally, my role as an adjunct lecturer in probability at Mohammed V University in Rabat enhanced my pedagogical skills through teaching a diverse group of students.
Currently, I am a lecturer in biostatistics at the Higher Institute of Nursing and Health Technology in Guelmim, Morocco. This position has strengthened my practical applications of statistical methods in health care and medicine, sparking my passion for the field.

Connect with me on Twitter or LinkedIn.

title: Contact Information
text:
Office Hours
My regular office hours are on [insert days and times here]. During this time, I’m available for in-person or virtual meetings.
If you’re unable to make it during my office hours, feel free to reach out via email to schedule an appointment.

title: Contact Information
text:
Contact Form
If you prefer, you can also use the contact form to send me a message directly from the website.

title: Contact Information
text:
Response Time
I typically respond to emails within 24-48 hours. If your matter is urgent, please mention it in the subject line.
Thank you for reaching out! I look forward to connecting with you.
